Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time until Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 is performed after SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Average time for Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants with SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response occurs

Name: Average waiting time to the Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 after SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Average time it takes Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 after the execution of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to final decision activity (SW-EIC Reject/SW-EIC Accept/SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time until Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 is performed after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Time between the Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and subsequent reviewer response activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time until Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 from manuscript submission confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to review process completion
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 Cycle Time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the end of the case

Name: Average time difference between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-EIC Major Revision in major revision variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum time for Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 compared to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Time to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 since the SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
